Posts.Content: Jun 12, 2007 07:26PM nicolebfarmer wrote: Thank you! That helps a lot! I know that the last time she went through it, I felt a little strange because if I talked about her and kept fussing over her it might annoy her. But on the other hand, if I talked about normal things I felt like I was being selfish and insensitive. So that is nice to know!
Posts.Title: advice on helping loved one please nicolebfarmer crami2
